{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3491161,"name":"pinkguava06","username":"HarrisonFord","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/harrisonford/{size}/246558_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-23T23:35:57.478Z","cooked":"

Wondering if anyone’s uploaded or has knowledge of another team’s Github repositories using the updated 2025 MAXSwerve template with Pathplanner? I know Firebears claim they’ve done it successfully but their 2025 repository is empty and the 2024 folder is riddled with errors since the Pathplanner and REV API have updated. I did try inserting the new translations but I either messed something up or something was lost in translation because it crashes and throws autobuilder errors without deploying. I also tried running the 2024 folder in WPILib 2024, but there’s file directory errors there too.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-01-23T23:35:57.478Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":62,"reads":92,"readers_count":91,"score":328.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":483294,"topic_slug":"pathplanner-with-maxswerve-template","display_username":"pinkguava06","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":56277,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Odd-Denier"},"post_url":"/t/pathplanner-with-maxswerve-template/483294/1","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3491347,"name":"Martin Nemaric","username":"Martini159","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/278dde/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-24T03:03:11.268Z","cooked":"

Yea, was going to suggest Firebear’s github (that’s how we got ours working last year)! We are just about to start about spinning up PathPlanner on our robot this year, so we haven’t totally ported stuff over, but here are my thoughts…

The biggest issue is that Autobuilder requires some methods that do not come in the stock Rev MAXSwerve code.

Copy the basic PathPlanner code from here…
https://pathplanner.dev/pplib-getting-started.html#install-pathplannerlib

The “configure” method for Autobuilder requires the following methods (or their equivalents) as parameters:

#1 - getPose
#2 - resetPose
#3 - getRobotRelativeSpeeds
#4 - driveRobotRelative

For #1, MAXSwerve already has getPose.
For #2, MAXSwerve calls this method resetOdometry, so just feed Autobuilder this::resetOdometry instead of this::resetPose
For #3 - This does not exist in stock MAXSwerve… Copy this method from Firebear’s github (line 233 to 235 in Bass subsystem)
For #4 - This does not exist in stock MAXSwerve… Copy two methods from Firebear’s github (line 220 to line 231 in Bass subsystem)

This should be all you really need to copy over. Hope this helps!

Thanks for the suggestion, but before I read it I did my own thing and I’m proud to say it works flawlessly. After I make controller commands I’ll put it on github for anyone else to look at

I have had the exact same question about updating the 2025 MaxSwerve Template with PathPlanner. If there was a full example with these two items integrated together as a template, that would be so extremely helpful. We have a very small software team with very little experience and are struggling to get these integrated together.
